string-array.name: msg_contents_array
string-array.item: Sometimes I'll start a sentence and I don't even know where it's going. I just hope I find it along the way
I love a good quitting story. It makes me feel like I have control over my own life. Gives me hope. Maybe I will have one of own someday. [laughs] But I dream... so...
The only difference between me and a homeless man is this job. I will do whatever it takes to surviveâ€¦like I did when I was a homeless man.
I know people are only excited to talk to me because of the trial. But if they talk to me for a while, and maybe people realize that I have something to say. And then one day... we're just talking.

resources.string: Yo hide me Consuela is after me
